messages.subject: Re: test
messages.msgSnippet: I lied.  I misspoke myself.  The weirdnesses will hit the frequent level.  I can tell.  ARGHH!  This message if it goes anywhere will be a testament to my
messages.messageBody:
I lied. I misspoke myself. The weirdnesses will hit the frequent level. I
can tell. ARGHH! This message if it goes anywhere will be a testament to
my complete lack of out this (expletive deleted) thing works. This message
absolutely cannot be sent because the computer is not set up yet in netscape
to be using our new server. I am now clicking the send button. If this
appears on the list I will be taking a vow of computer silence until such
time as my wife gets home and tells me what is happening. The way I feel
about this is an indicator of having spent to many years as a child in the
confines of schools.

messages.subject: test
messages.msgSnippet: We are in the process of changing servers. Going from cable modem to high speed phone modem.  We are trialing the high speed phone modem now.  I can read my
messages.messageBody:
We are in the process of changing servers. Going from cable modem to high
speed phone modem. We are trialing the high speed phone modem now. I can
read my mail at one address but can no longer reply from there so I have
subscribed anew at my new (maybe permanent) email address. What I am
trying to say is I don't know what I am doing so anything can happen. Please
bear with occasional weirdnesses.

Joel
